Name: Long Island Lemonade
Ingredients: 15 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE first seven ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade. Serve with a stirrer.
Review: Surprising dry with sharp zesty citrus, laced with 4 different white spirits and triple sec liqueur, lengthened with lemonade.
Nutrition: One serving of Long Island Lemonade contains 224 calories
